name: XWUIDialog
description: Modal dialog component with configurable header, body, and footer. Supports multiple sizes, backdrop overlay, keyboard navigation, and customizable close behavior.

input.description: Input data required for the component
rules: Optional title string for dialog header
Optional content (HTMLElement or string) for dialog body
Optional footer HTMLElement for dialog footer

title.description: Dialog title text displayed in header

content.description: Dialog body content (element or HTML string)

footer.description: Dialog footer element (typically contains action buttons)

rules: Renders modal dialog with overlay backdrop
Displays header with title and optional close button
Applies size styling (small, medium, large, fullscreen)
Manages body scroll lock when open
Emits close events when dialog is closed

actions.description: User actions supported by the component
rules: Close button dismisses dialog (if closable is true)
Clicking backdrop closes dialog (if closeOnBackdrop is true)
Escape key closes dialog (if closeOnEscape is true)
onClose event handler can be registered

isOpen.description: Check if dialog is currently open

closeOnEscape.description: Close dialog when pressing Escape key

scrollable.description: Enable scrolling for dialog body content

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the component
